domains.name: News & Media
domains.description: Articles, summaries from major news outlets
sample_questions: Summarize the key news stories discussed in the articles.
List the major topics frequently covered by the news sources in this dataset.
Explain how coverage of a specific event or issue is described across different articles.

domains.name: Sports
domains.description: IPL stats, match data, cricket analytics
sample_questions: Summarize the major IPL seasons or tournaments described in the documents.
List key players and their performances as discussed in the text.
Explain important match highlights or turning points mentioned in the dataset.

domains.name: Elections
domains.description: Voter statistics, election results, and constituency data from ECI
sample_questions: Summarize the main factors influencing election outcomes described in the documents.
List major political parties or alliances mentioned and their roles in recent elections.
Explain how voter turnout trends are described across different elections in the dataset.

domains.name: Agriculture
domains.description: Crop yield data, agricultural prices, and farming statistics
sample_questions: Summarize the main crops and farming practices discussed in the documents.
List key challenges faced by farmers as described in the dataset.
Explain how changes in crop yields or prices are described over time in the texts.

domains.name: Healthcare
domains.description: Hospital statistics, disease data, and public health information
sample_questions: Summarize the major public health issues described in the documents.
List important healthcare schemes, programs, or policies mentioned in the text.
Explain how access to healthcare services differs across regions in the dataset.

domains.name: Education
domains.description: Literacy rates, school statistics, educational infrastructure data
sample_questions: Summarize the key educational trends or issues discussed in the documents.
List the different types of schools or institutions mentioned and their characteristics.
Explain how literacy or enrollment patterns are described across regions.

domains.name: Traffic
domains.description: Road usage patterns, toll collection, traffic management data
sample_questions: Summarize the main traffic patterns or congestion issues described in the dataset.
List important roads, corridors, or toll routes discussed in the text.
Explain the common traffic management measures or policies mentioned in the documents.

domains.name: Economy
domains.description: GDP statistics, inflation rates, macroeconomic indicators
sample_questions: Summarize the overall economic trends described in the documents.
List key macroeconomic indicators mentioned and how they are changing.
Explain how different sectors of the economy are portrayed in the dataset.

domains.name: Finance
domains.description: UPI transactions, banking data, financial services statistics
sample_questions: Summarize the growth of digital payments or UPI usage described in the text.
List key statistics or patterns related to banking and financial services.
Explain how the expansion of digital finance is described in the documents.

domains.name: Language/NLP
domains.description: Text corpora, translations, linguistic datasets for Indian languages

List the Indian languages and NLP tasks mentioned in the documents.
Explain how translation or language processing challenges are described in the text.

domains.name: Weather
domains.description: Rainfall data, temperature records, meteorological information
sample_questions: Summarize the major weather patterns or climate trends described in the documents.
List key statistics related to rainfall or temperature mentioned in the text.
Explain how extreme weather events are described in the dataset.
